content: 27 total pattern repeats need help e-mail questions to natasha@grittyknits com when knitting gloves it s a good idea to try them on occasionally and customize the finger length irecommend continuing in pattern until your finger tip is just barely visible above the needles first decrease round k2tog p1 s2kpo p1 ssk 3 times k2 k2tog twice 11 sts left second decrease round ssk k1 k2tog twice k2 ssk 7 sts left thread tail through remaining stitches and draw up put remaining 41 sts back on needles k1 pattern 19 sts knit to end of round pu 4 sts along base of pinkie work 3 more rounds keeping pattern consistent rh ring finger k1 pattern 5 k1 place next 28 sts on a holder cast on 3 sts k10 20 ring finger sts subsequent ring finger rounds k1 pattern 5 knit to end of round rh index finger continue until you have 30 total pattern repeats put all sts from holder back on needles on the last round of the 30th repeat stop 1 stitch short of the end k1 pattern 5 knit across remaining sts pu 5 sts from base of of the round you will knit this stitch together with the first stitch of middle finger 20 index finger sts the next round subsequent index finger rounds k1 pattern 5 knit to end of round 1st decrease round k2tog p1 s2kpo p1 ssk 3 times k3 k2tog continue until you have 30 pattern repeats twice 12 sts left on the last round of the 30th repeat stop 1 stitch short of the end 2nd decrease round ssk k1 k2 decrease twice k3 ssk 8 sts left you will knit this stitch together with the first stitch of the next round thread tail through remaining stitches and draw up work decreases same as for rhringfinger rh middle finger rh thumb put the first 7 and the last 6 sts from holder back on needles put all thumb sts from holder back on needle k1 pattern 5 k1 cast on 4 k6 pu 4 from base of ring finger k6 pattern 5 k6 pick up 6 sts along gap 23 total sts 21 middle finger sts subsequent thumb rounds k6 pattern 5 knit to end of round subsequent middle finger rounds k1 pattern 5 knit to end of round continue until you have 22 pattern repeats continue for 31 pattern repeats 1st decrease round k2tog 3 times p1 s2kpo p1 ssk 4 times k2 on the last round of the 31st repeat stop 1 stitch short of the end k2tog 13 sts left you will knit this stitch together with the first stitch of the next round 2nd decrease round ssk 2 times k1 k2tog 3 times ssk 7 sts left 1st decrease round k2tog p1 s2kpo p1 ssk 4 times k2tog 3 times thread tail through remaining stitches and draw up 11 sts left 2nd decrease round ssk k1 k2tog twice k2 ssk 7 sts left left glove only
